description:
Purpose: Template does the following:
1) Create an isolated network - VPC, Public Subnet, Route, Network Security Group will be created.
2) Provision EC2 instance and associate it to the newly created network.

Inputs Required: Instance Parameters - Instance Type, Instance Name, Keypair Name and Image ID, Network Parameters - VPC CIDR and Public Subnet CIDR.

Use case(s): Can be used to provision on demand/schedule an EC2 instance with isolated VPC connected to a public subnet.
name: AWS_Provision_VM_VPC_Public-Subnet
